column5: Just started hitting some spots around Wallaceburg to try the various fishing styles. Trying my hand at panfishing (Crappie/Gills/Sunfish). Anybody have any tips?? Thanks in advance.
just use a bobber and a couple spit shots then a size 4 bait holder hook ans worms work or wax worms or even minows.... oh yeah and maby try casting a curly tail
